mapper.select: SELECT CLINSPE_NO, CLINSPE_BLOK_CODE, CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_DAY, CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_TIME, CLINSPE_BLOK_QNT, PAT_NO, PAT_NM FROM SL_CLINSPE_BLOK WHERE CLINSPE_NO = #{clinspeNo} ORDER BY CLINSPE_NO ,CLINSPE_BLOK_CODE ,CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_DAY

mapper.update: UPDATE SL_CLINSPE_BLOK SET CLINSPE_NO=#{clinspeNo}, CLINSPE_BLOK_CODE=#{clinspeBlokCode}, CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_DAY=#{clinspeBlokProdDay}, CLINSPE_BLOK_PROD_TIME=#{clinspeBlokProdTime}, CLINSPE_BLOK_QNT=#{clinspeBlokQnt}, PAT_NO=#{patNo}, PAT_NM=#{patNm} WHERE CLINSPE_NO=#{clinspeNo}
